scripts.load:json: bash -c "[ -d reports ] || mkdir reports; k6 run load-test.js --summary-export=reports/$(date +%F_%H-%M-%S).json"
scripts.load:html: bash -c "[ -d reports ] || mkdir reports; k6 run load-test.js --summary-export=reports/summary.json && k6-to-html reports/summary.json > reports/result.html"
